features.featureTitle: Move the "Download CSV" export button on the manager Inactivity Dashboard to a more prominent location: place it in the page header row next to the "Inactivity Dashboard" title/description area, aligned to the right, instead of inside the "Inactive Operators" card header. The button must remain visible only when there is at least one inactive operator to export, and it must continue to export the same CSV content and filename format currently used.
